name: Block Blitz for Playdate
description:
Block Blitz was a classic BBC Micro game which was published in Beebug magazine in 1984 and was then a staple in game compilation floppies that got shared around (this was long before the internet made sharing easy).

This Playdate port matches the graphics and gameplay precisely, using the same sprite graphics, sound, and the BBC Micro font.
